page.title: 08Education in West Enfield
page.content: In our part of Western Enfield we have eleven educational establishments.These include four primary schools which are DeBohun,Merryhills,Eversley and Grange Park.Grange Park covers a site of about eight acres.The view from the playground is stunning.The Infant School has an unusual circular hall. The three Secondry Schools are Southgates Upper and Lower School and St Ignatius Lower School.The former is linked to Eversley,Grange Park and DeBohun. Oaktree and Waverley Special Schools are also in our area.They are for children who have severe learning difficulties or are profoundly handicapped. Grange Park Preparatory School and Vita-et-Pax are both Independent Schools.
